# QorexNchange - Vue.js Crypto Exchange Project

This is a modern Vue.js project for a cryptocurrency exchange platform based on Figma designs.

## Tech Stack
- Vue 3 with Composition API
- TypeScript for type safety
- Vite for fast development and building
- Tailwind CSS for responsive styling
- Animation libraries for modern UX

## Development Guidelines
- Follow responsive design principles for all screen sizes
- Implement smooth animations and transitions
- Use TypeScript for all components and composables
- Follow Vue 3 best practices and composition API patterns
- Ensure accessibility standards are met

## Project Structure
- `/src/components` - Reusable Vue components
- `/src/views` - Page components
- `/src/composables` - Composition API logic
- `/src/assets` - Static assets and styles
- `/src/types` - TypeScript type definitions
